name: Hopefield: Tales of Halloween
description:
Hopefield: Tales of Halloween is a series of horror games and the first volume contains two games. Helloween and Tony is going Home.

Helloween is a game where 4 children need to escape from an abandoned house.

This game was inspired by classic games like Dennis The Menace, Halloween (Atari Version) and the Stranger Things series.

Tony is going home is a platform game where we must go through the city of Hopefield and get home safely. It's an obscure version of the classic Bobby is going Home.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tales of Halloween  is a puzzle /platform/horror  game. Inspired by horror movies and retro games.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features:

* Full controller support.

* Secrets

* 3 endings

* CGA Filter

* Fullscreen (F)

* Language - English and Portuguese
